relation: 緑川 開 Kai Midorikawa グリーン Green
綠川 開 Kāi Lǜchuān 酷林 Kùlín
His surname contains the Japanese word for "green" (緑 midori). From Pokémon Green game.
Same as Japanese name. Transliteration of Japanese name.
Similar to the first rival's dub name in the anime.
pageTitle: Green (Pocket Monsters) - Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia
textBeforeTable: Names A look-a-like of Green who has the same name as him cameos in Clefairy, Form Teacher Of Class 1P!!, wearing Blue's FRLG outfit. Pokémon Ruby-Sapphire Green's look-a-like in Trivia Where is Chikorita?! Debut Chikorita was one of the Pokémon that Professor Oak was giving away. It ended up being stolen by Green before the sixty-fourth chapter. Chikorita ended picking up Green's fierce personality but was returned to Professor Oak later on. Chikorita's only known move is Razor Leaf. Chikorita
